snippet: A class-action lawsuit claiming to represent cholera victims in Haiti and their relatives in the United States was filed against the United Nations on Tuesday in Federal District Court in Brooklyn.
abstract: Class-action lawsuit claiming to represent cholera victims in Haiti and their relatives in the United States is filed against United Nations in Federal District Court in Brooklyn; peacekeepers from Nepal, where cholera is endemic, have been blamed for situation.
lead_paragraph: A class-action lawsuit claiming to represent cholera victims in Haiti and their relatives in the United States was filed against the United Nations on Tuesday in Federal District Court in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Suit Filed in Haiti Cholera Epidemic
headline.print_headline: Suit Filed in Haiti Cholera Epidemic
